pages.text: The $(item)Antimatter Constructor$() uses Zaps to conjure Antimatter.$(br2)Each Antimatter costs 1,000,000âš¡.$(br2)It can accept up to IV current.
$(item)Antimatter$() is used in a handful of endgame recipes.$(br2)You can put $(l:ftbic:machines/reprocessor)Scrap and Scrap Boxes$() in the left slot to make Antimatter cheaper.
